description: This CSS file contains styles for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, defining color variables, layout styles, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: game
classes.description: Main container for the Tic Tac Toe game, styled to center its content with a flexible layout.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the title of the game, designed to emphasize prominence with color and size.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styling for the game status display, emphasizing the current game's state with size and color.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styling for the game board layout, set up as a grid to display the squares for player moves.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for individual squares on the board, providing visual feedback on hover and emphasizing clickable interaction.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button, allowing users to restart the game with distinct button interactions.
